contribution.title: Nearby Services
contribution.description: Connects customers with skilled workers available in their nearby location.

contribution.title: Job Opportunities
contribution.description: Provides job openings to skilled workers in the unorganized sector.

contribution.title: Ratings & Experience
contribution.description: Shows verified ratings and experience to help customers choose trusted workers.

contribution.title: Fair Wages
contribution.description: Helps ensure workers receive appropriate wages based on their skills and work.

contribution.title: 24x7 Support
contribution.description: Offers round-the-clock customer support for both workers and customers.
